newsitem.title: USA: Cyrix sees no interruption of shipments.
newsitem.headline: Cyrix sees no interruption of shipments.

text.p: Cyrix Corp said on Tuesday that it believes that it has satisfied the terms of the temporary restraining order that Creative Technology Ltd had sought against Cyrix and that plans for MediaGX processor shipments will not be interrupted.

Cyrix said it has removed all applet software authored by Creative Technology from its web site and that it has taken steps to ensure that Cyrix is identified as the source of the sound controller in the Windows 95 system properties screen.

Creative Technology filed the lawsuit on March 17, 1997 in the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of California, alleging that Cyrix and certain of its customers were misleading consumers about the Cyrix Media GX's capabilities and source of the computer audio solution.
